extendedInfo.description: The Pickup Line Game is the ultimate test of your pick up line skills.  See what would happen if you randomly bounce pickup lines off an unsuspecting target.  Will you get lucky or will you get slapped in the face.  Guananteed to make you laugh as you try out outrageious lines that you would never use on a real girl or guy...unless you are feeling particularly adventurous.Do you need help picking up that special guy or girl? Do you need a list of tried and true pickup lines?  Do you need to try out a line on a virtual girl or guy before using it on the real thing?  If so, then the Pickup Line Game is the game for you!Check out some of the features:Features:â¢ Random generation of pick up lines to try on that special girl of guy.â¢ Ability to choose whether you want to pick up a guy or a girl.â¢ Stunning images of virtual girls and guys to pickup.â¢ Play to reveal functionality that makes you play the game to reveal the images of your target.â¢ Multiple rounds of play so you can constantly try to pick a different girl or guy.

reviews.comment: Funny app. Gonna try some of these lines too haha
